Name: Smash
About the game: This game takes you into the mysterious world, where each level is striking in its beauty and harmony. You have to explore it. - Fly over beautiful designs by clicking on the pyramid, which will give you the opportunity to fly further. - Avoid various obstacles by clicking on them. - The game contains 7 levels. How to Play: Click on the mouse left button to destroy the glass pyramids & push away the obstacles. Stay focused and concentrate on the path destroy every pyramid and push away obstacles coming in the path. Show your reflexes and hit the pyramids to get a longer time to go as far as you can. Try to avoid obstacles by hitting them, stay focus to go as far as you can to complete the level.
